items.title: The rules for paying taxes on tips and overtime are changing thanks to Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill. Here’s what to expect

items.title: Why two-time founder and MacArthur Genius Daphne Koller sees a future where humans “create together with the machines”
items.description: "The future has to be getting people to partner well and create together with the machines," Koller told Fortune.

items.title: Hershey CEO’s exit knocks the number of women running Fortune 500 companies
items.description: Michele Buck will retire from the chocolate-maker—and her successor is the CEO of Wendy's.

items.title: AI is turbocharging worker productivity but it’s also wreaking havoc on their mental health
items.description: New research is a “flashing red light for CHROs.”
